ModMetaData.name: Animal Gear Basic Expanded
ModMetaData.author: Chim
ModMetaData.description:
<color=orange>Requires at least HugsLib 5.0.0 and Animal Gear 0.9.0</color>\n
Version 1.5.0
Load order // HugsLib // Animal Gear ... // Animal Gear Basic
A small mod that adds bear / wolf armor and scarfs for dogs ^^ (wolfs and wargs too) mostly to show the capabilities of my other mod Animal Gear: Base and as an example for people looking to add their own animal gear (which is not that much work, see the "Animal Gear: Base" description or the contents of this mod).
The armor is pretty helpful if you don't like your animals to get hurt or killed as easily in a raid.
You might need to add them to the outfit "Anything" or create a new outfit on the animal-tab.
